Title: Cozy Master Bedroom at Boon Lay
Location: THE CENTRIS 75 JURONG WEST CENTRAL 3Boon Lay, West Singapore
Description:
'We have a master bedroom, comes with ensuite bathtub, over looking the greenery, serene view.
- Above Boonlay MRT,
- Great facilities, massive pools, reflexology pool, water slide, tennis courts, basketball court, gym, BBQ areas, table tennis etc
- Includes utilities (quarterly aircon servicing, highest speed wifi, washing machine /dryer etc, cooking). 
- Includes weekly cleaning of the common areas and ensuite bathroom
We want you to live here, not just run into your room and hide. Co-living environment
The apartment looks out over gardens and partial pool view. It's rather bright, quiet and gets a nice breeze through the glass window as you rest yourself at the baywindow. There is a dry kitchen/wet kitchen setup with ample room for storage and cooking. An allocated shoerack for your use. There's also a small yard area inside. 
Fully furnished with TV,  King sized bed, huge wardrobe, cabinets and lots of storage.
Kitchen appliances include microwave, oven, 3 tiers steamer, toaster, pressure cooker, air fryer and a Nespresso coffee machine. 
Iron and iron board. Google home in the hall and motion detection lightings.
It is an integrated development situated above Jurong Point Shopping Centre (and Boon Lay MRT). Full facilities, multiple pools, sauna,  water play, tennis courts, BBQs, gym etc. There are all the modern conveniences such as 24hr supermarkets, eateries, abundant shops, several foodcourts catering to all cuisines - Vegetarian, western, local asian, halal etc. Almost 500 shops.
Attached are several childcare centres, education/enrichment centres, banks, clinics, community centre, library, cafes etc.
Close to Canadian International School and lots of good local schools.
It is located above a major Bus interchange/terminal also - for those heading to NTU and the surrounding Jurong business park/innovation precinct.
The green line/East-west line is a straight line to jurong east, clementi, dover (NUS, colleges etc), Buona Vista (Star Vista, Biopolis, NCC church etc) and then Outram Park (SGH), Tanjong Pagar, Raffles place, city hall.(36 mins the whole way to city hall).
Welcome to check out the room. 
Avail Early Dec 2023'

Title: The Florida unit for rent
Description:
'A spacious 3-bedder for your living comfort. Looking for tenants who enjoy big space, indoor and outdoor patio, alfresco dinning and many more. Ample storage is available in all corners of the house. Meticulously kept and well-maintained by the owner, we are looking for tenants who are like-minded to ensure a clean and great living environment.

The living area has ample space for you to place your furniture. The house also spots an open-concept kitchen with a quality kitchen island that overlooks the entire living area and patio.

The patio has been recently renovated with new ceiling fans, trellis and automated ziptrack to keep rain and shine out. Enclose it for an intimate gathering or open it to enjoy the greenery outdoor. The house has had a new coat of paint only a couple years back.

The yard area is well-ventilated with windows and fan, and also comes with a toilet.

Each common bedroom is in-built with cabinets, wardrobes, study desks and beds.

Master bedroom has built-in cabinets, walk-in wardrobe, dresser and study desk; as well as a raised platform which provides a cosy retreat near the window and look-out to the greenery outside. The master bedroom toilet has His and Hers wash basins to cater for concurrent usage and to avoid the morning rush.'

A smart TV is a television set or set-top box with integrated Internet and is an example of technological convergence between computers and television sets and set-top boxes. 

Besides the traditional functions of television sets and set-top boxes provided through traditional broadcasting media, these devices can also provide Internet TV, online interactive media, over-the-top content, as well as on-demand streaming media, and home networking access.

Title: SkyPark @ Somerset, Bungalow in the Sky Duplex with Sky Garden 4bedrooms
Description:
'Please Call / Whatsapp / Sms : +6593808038 
Sam Ong for viewing. Thanks. 

PropNex Associate Division Director 
Cea Reg : R016315I Mobile / Whatsapp / Sms : +6593808038 


SkyPark @ Somerset, 
22 St Thomas Walk
4+1 bedrooms, 3,347sqft High floor,
Bungalow in the Sky Duplex layout, 800sqft Sky Garden on every floor, 
Private Balcony with Jacuzzi, 
individual unit on each floor, 
High ceiling, Windy. 

Partial Furnished, 
asking $28k (Subject to GST)
Fully furnished can be arranged.
Available 23rd Feb 23
(Sample photos as shown) 

Uncover the beauty of luxury living at its height. Luxurious way of living in a spacious duplex home, high above ground, surrounded by lush gardens of green and a backdrop of blue sky. 

This 32 storey development, 
comprising of 56 apartments, 
will take your breath away every day with a stunning panoramic view of the surrounding city-view. 
A spacious sky terrace, a glass passenger lift, 
a 40-metre swimming pool and a cigar terrace are fine touches to your abode, 
which has a ceiling height of six-metres. 

Vertical living in Singapore can’t get more exciting than this. SkyPark was innovatively conceptualized to turn what would have been constraints being the inherent problems posed by a small plot of high density land in the city into an intelligent multi-layered architectural response. ... 

The intention was to design houses in a residential tower. Experiencing the 'gardens' from within the apartment, the space does actually create a "grounded" sensation, if not for the city skyline beyond. The jury was very impressed by the way in which the architect was able to integrate these design strategies successfully to create meaningful spaces within a coherent piece of architecture. 

Facilities, 
40m Lap pool 
Gym 
BBQ area 
Function room 
24hrs security 
Golf bag storage '

Title: SkyPark @ Somerset, Bungalow in the Sky Duplex with Sky Garden 4bedrooms
Location: 22 St Thomas WalkRiver Valley, Central Singapore
Description:
'Please Call / Whatsapp / Sms : +6593808038 
Sam Ong for viewing. Thanks. 

PropNex Associate Division Director 
Cea Reg : R016315I Mobile / Whatsapp / Sms : +6593808038 


SkyPark @ Somerset, 
22 St Thomas Walk
4+1 bedrooms, 3,347sqft High floor,
Bungalow in the Sky Duplex layout, 800sqft Sky Garden on every floor, 
Private Balcony with Jacuzzi, 
individual unit on each floor, 
High ceiling, Windy. 

Partial Furnished, 
asking $28k (Subject to GST)
Fully furnished can be arranged.
Available 23rd Feb 23
(Sample photos as shown) 

Uncover the beauty of luxury living at its height. Luxurious way of living in a spacious duplex home, high above ground, surrounded by lush gardens of green and a backdrop of blue sky. 

This 32 storey development, 
comprising of 56 apartments, 
will take your breath away every day with a stunning panoramic view of the surrounding city-view. 
A spacious sky terrace, a glass passenger lift, 
a 40-metre swimming pool and a cigar terrace are fine touches to your abode, 
which has a ceiling height of six-metres. 

Vertical living in Singapore can’t get more exciting than this. SkyPark was innovatively conceptualized to turn what would have been constraints being the inherent problems posed by a small plot of high density land in the city into an intelligent multi-layered architectural response. ... 

The intention was to design houses in a residential tower. Experiencing the 'gardens' from within the apartment, the space does actually create a "grounded" sensation, if not for the city skyline beyond. The jury was very impressed by the way in which the architect was able to integrate these design strategies successfully to create meaningful spaces within a coherent piece of architecture. 

Facilities, 
40m Lap pool 
Gym 
BBQ area 
Function room 
24hrs security 
Golf bag storage '
